00020 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 XLecroyDSO::XLecroyDSO(const char *name, bool runtime,
00022            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00023            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00024            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00025            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00026     XCharDeviceDriver<XDSO>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers) {
00027     const char* ch[] = {"C1", "C2", "C3", "C4", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", 0L};
00028     for(int i = 0; ch[i]; i++) {
00029         trace1()->add(ch[i]);
00030         trace2()->add(ch[i]);
00031     }
00032     const char* sc[] = {"0.02", "0.05", "0.1", "0.2", "0.5", "1", "2", "5", "10",
00033                         "20", "50", "100", 0L};
00034     for(int i = 0; sc[i]; i++)
00035     {
00036         vFullScale1()->add(sc[i]);
00037         vFullScale2()->add(sc[i]);
00038     }
00039     const char* tr[] = {"C1", "C2", "C3", "C4", "LINE", "EX", "EX10", "PA", "ETM10", 0L};
00040     for(int i = 0; tr[i]; i++)
00041     {
00042         trigSource()->add(tr[i]);
00043     }
00044 
00045     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(20); //20msec
00046     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeSPoll(10); //10msec
00047     interface()->setEOS("\n");
00048 
00049     recordLength()->value(10000);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void
00053 XLecroyDSO::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00054 {
00055     interface()->send("COMM_HEADER OFF");
00056     interface()->send("COMM_FORMAT DEF9,WORD,BIN");
00057     //LSB first for litte endian.
00058     interface()->send("COMM_ORDER LO");
00059     onAverageChanged(average());
00060 
00061     start();
00062 }
00063 void 
00064 XLecroyDSO::onTrace1Changed(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00065     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00066     std::string ch = trace1()->to_str();
00067     if(!ch.empty()) {
00068         interface()->sendf("%s:TRACE ON", ch.c_str());
00069     }
00070     onAverageChanged(average());
00071 }
00072 void 
00073 XLecroyDSO::onTrace2Changed(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00074     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00075     std::string ch = trace2()->to_str();
00076     if(!ch.empty()) {
00077         interface()->sendf("%s:TRACE ON", ch.c_str());
00078     }
00079     onAverageChanged(average());
00080 }
00081 void 
00082 XLecroyDSO::onAverageChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00083     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00084     interface()->send("TRIG_MODE STOP");
00085     int avg = *average();
00086     avg = std::max(1, avg);
00087     bool sseq = *singleSequence();
00088     if(avg == 1) {
00089 //      interface()->send("F1:TRACE OFF");
00090 //      interface()->send("F2:TRACE OFF");
00091         if(sseq) {
00092             interface()->send("ARM");
00093         }
00094         else {
00095             interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");            
00096         }
00097     }
00098     else {
00099 //      const char *atype = sseq ? "SUMMED" : "CONTINUOUS";
00100         const char *atype = sseq ? "AVGS" : "AVGC";
00101         std::string ch = trace1()->to_str();
00102         if(!ch.empty()) {
00103 //          interface()->sendf("TA:DEFINE EQN,'AVG(%s)',AVGTYPE,%s,SWEEPS,%d",
00104 //              ch.c_str(), atype, avg);
00105             interface()->sendf("TA:DEFINE EQN,'%s(%s)',SWEEPS,%d",
00106                 atype, ch.c_str(), avg);
00107             interface()->send("TA:TRACE ON");
00108         }
00109         ch = trace2()->to_str();
00110         if(!ch.empty()) {
00111             interface()->sendf("TB:DEFINE EQN,'%s(%s)',SWEEPS,%d",
00112                 atype, ch.c_str(), avg);
00113             interface()->send("TB:TRACE ON");
00114         }
00115         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00116     }
00117 }

00120 XLecroyDSO::onSingleChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node) {
00121     onAverageChanged(node);
00122 }

00145 XLecroyDSO::onVFullScale1Changed(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {

00148     interface()->sendf("%s:VOLT_DIV %.1g", ch.c_str(), atof(vFullScale1()->to_str().c_str())/10.0);
00149 }

00173 void
00174 XLecroyDSO::onForceTriggerTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00175     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00176     //  interface()->send("FORCE_TRIGER");
00177     if((*average() <= 1) && *singleSequence()) {
00178         interface()->send("ARM");
00179     }
00180     else {
00181         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 void
00186 XLecroyDSO::startSequence() {
00187     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00188     if((*average() <= 1) && *singleSequence())
00189         interface()->send("ARM");
00190     else
00191         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00192     interface()->send("CLEAR_SWEEPS");
00193 }
00194 
00195 int
00196 XLecroyDSO::acqCount(bool *seq_busy) {
00197     bool sseq = *singleSequence();
00198     unsigned int n = 0;
00199     int avg = *average();
00200     avg = std::max(1, avg);
00201     if(!trace1()->to_str().empty()) {
00202         interface()->queryf("%s:TRACE?", trace1()->to_str().c_str());
00203         if(!strncmp(&interface()->buffer()[0], "ON", 2)) {
00204             //trace1 is displayed.
00205             std::string ch = (avg > 1) ? std::string("TA") : trace1()->to_str();
00206             n = lrint(inspectDouble("SWEEPS_PER_ACQ", ch));
00207         }
00208     }
00209     if(!sseq || (avg < 2)) {
00210         interface()->query("INR?");
00211         if(interface()->toInt() & 1) {
00212             if(!sseq)
00213                 m_totalCount++;
00214             else
00215                 n = 1;
00216         }
00217         if(!sseq)
00218             n = m_totalCount;
00219     }
00220     *seq_busy = (n < avg);
00221     return n;
00222 }

00224 double
00225 XLecroyDSO::inspectDouble(const char *req, const std::string &trace) {
00226     interface()->queryf("%s:INSPECT? '%s'", trace.c_str(), req);
00227     double x;
00228     interface()->scanf("\"%*s : %lf", &x);
00229     return x;
00230 }

00232 double
00233 XLecroyDSO::getTimeInterval() {
00234     return inspectDouble("HORIZ_INTERVAL", trace1()->to_str());

00237 void
00238 XLecroyDSO::getWave(std::deque<std::string> &channels)
00239 {
00240     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00241 //  interface()->send("TRIG_MODE STOP");
00242     try {
00243         push<unsigned int32_t>(channels.size());
00244         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < std::min((unsigned int)channels.size(), 4u); i++) {
00245             std::string ch = channels[i];
00246             if(*average() > 1) {
00247                 const char *fch[] = {"TA", "TB", "TC", "TD"};
00248                 ch = fch[i];
00249             }
00250             interface()->sendf("%s:WAVEFORM? ALL", ch.c_str());
00251             msecsleep(50);
00252             interface()->receive(4); //For "ALL,"
00253             if(interface()->buffer().size() != 4)
00254                 throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00255             interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(false);
00256             interface()->receive(2); //For "#9"
00257             if(interface()->buffer().size() != 2)
00258                 throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00259             rawData().insert(rawData().end(), 
00260                              interface()->buffer().begin(), interface()->buffer().end());
00261             unsigned int n;
00262             interface()->scanf("#%1u", &n);
00263             interface()->receive(n);
00264             if(interface()->buffer().size() != n)
00265                 throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00266             rawData().insert(rawData().end(), 
00267                              interface()->buffer().begin(), interface()->buffer().end());
00268             int blks = interface()->toUInt();
00269             XTime tstart = XTime::now();
00270             for(int retry = 0;; retry++) {
00271                 interface()->receive(blks);
00272                 blks -= interface()->buffer().size();
00273                 rawData().insert(rawData().end(), 
00274                                  interface()->buffer().begin(), interface()->buffer().end());
00275                 if(blks <= 0)
00276                     break;
00277                 if(XTime::now() - tstart > 3.0)
00278                     break; //timeout.
00279                 msecsleep(retry * 20);
00280             }
00281             if(blks != 0)
00282                 throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00283             interface()->receive(); //For LF.
00284             interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(true);
00285         }
00286     }
00287     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00288         interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(true);
00289         throw e;
00290     }
00291 //  if(!*singleSequence())
00292 //      interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00293 }
00294 void
00295 XLecroyDSO::convertRaw() throw (XRecordError&) {
00296 #define WAVEDESC_WAVE_ARRAY_COUNT 116
00297 #define DATA_BLOCK 346
00298     
00299     unsigned int ch_cnt = pop<unsigned int32_t>();
00300     for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < ch_cnt; ch++) {
00301         std::vector<char>::iterator dit = rawDataPopIterator();
00302         unsigned int n;
00303         sscanf(&*dit, "#%1u", &n);
00304         dit += n + 2;
00305         if(strncmp(&*dit, "WAVEDESC", 8)) {
00306             throw XRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00307         }
00308         dit += DATA_BLOCK;
00309         rawDataPopIterator() += WAVEDESC_WAVE_ARRAY_COUNT + n + 2;
00310         long count = pop<int32_t>();
00311         pop<int32_t>();
00312         long first_valid = pop<int32_t>();
00313         long last_valid = pop<int32_t>();
00314         long first = pop<int32_t>();
00315         pop<int32_t>();
00316         pop<int32_t>();
00317         pop<int32_t>();
00318         long acqcount = pop<int32_t>();
00319         pop<short>();
00320         pop<short>();
00321         float vgain = pop<float>();
00322         float voffset = pop<float>();
00323         pop<float>();
00324         pop<float>();
00325         pop<short>();
00326         pop<short>();
00327         float interval = pop<float>();
00328         double hoffset = pop<double>();
00329         
00330         if(ch == 0) {
00331             if((count < 0) || 
00332                 (rawData().size() < (count * 2 + DATA_BLOCK + n + 2) * ch_cnt))
00333                 throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00334             setParameters(ch_cnt, hoffset, interval, count);
00335         }
00336         
00337         double *wave = waveDisp(ch);
00338         rawDataPopIterator() = dit;
00339         for(int i = 0; i < std::min(count, (long)lengthDisp()); i++) {
00340             short x = pop<short>();
00341             float v = voffset + vgain * x;
00342             *wave++ = v;
00343         }
00344     }
00345 }
